name: AEMY
description:
In a cold world ruled by technology and fear people need psychological assistance, moral support and comprehension. A.E.M.Y. is your artifical empathy provider but humans are complex and different from each other, and she needs to be trained.

Help AEMY become a better Artificial Intelligence, by selecting the best or the least worst answer : she will learn... or maybe not.

This game was developed in 48 hours during Global Game Jam 2020 in Bari.
Hopefully one day we will implement machine learning, as it was intended from the very start. In the meantime we will update the story made in Twine.

Game Design, Story and scripting by Simona Maiorano
Programming and shaders by Giovanni Lucio Colì
Art by Giuseppe Longo
Music by Manuel Tricarico
